name: Pagita
goal:
Pagita envision a future where digital and physical worlds are connected.
We believe startup business should be encouraged thru a mix of policies regarding funding, tax relief, and deregulation/sandboxing, in order to remove obstacles to the deployment of innovative services.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Development, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: We follow the development in the financial and payment sector, as well as the promotion of innovative startup. Main area of interest are PSD2, and Horizon 2020.
